basics.name: Amol Sood
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior software engineer with 10 years of experience designing and operating cloud-native, event-driven systems in regulated HealthTech and FinTech environments. Specialises in AWS serverless architectures, API design, and high-reliability platforms, with a strong track record of owning complex integrations end-to-end and translating business and regulatory requirements into scalable production systems.

work.name: Sciana Health
highlights: Built the backend platform from the ground up for a scale-up healthcare product, delivering a serverless AWS architecture supporting multi-clinic, multi-provider workflows and designed to scale to high volumes of patient and booking events
Integrated NeuroFlex VR medical devices to automate ingestion of diagnostic data and generation of clinician-ready PDF reports, establishing the core automated clinical assessment workflow
Designed and validated an event-driven architecture (EventBridge, SQS, SNS), load-tested to handle thousands of asynchronous events per day with strong service decoupling
Established CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure-as-code early, enabling multiple safe production deployments per week and reducing operational risk as the platform prepared for broader rollout
work.summary: Owned backend architecture and delivery for a cloud-native healthcare platform supporting concussion assessments and preventative health checks across multiple clinics in Australia. Led the design of serverless APIs, event-driven workflows, and secure medical device integrations, ensuring high reliability and compliance in a clinical environment.

work.name: Stockpile
work.position: Senior Software Engineer - Platform Integrations & Cloud Architecture
highlights: Delivered and operated production integrations with regulated FinTech partners including Green Dot, Apex Clearing (Apex Ascend), and Apex Bakkt, supporting brokerage, payments, and custody workflows for 50k+ users
Designed secure and auditable integration architectures for sensitive financial and brokerage data, meeting partner compliance requirements for traceability, reconciliation, and incident reporting
Built and maintained AWS-based production services using Lambda, DynamoDB, ECS, EventBridge, SNS, and SQL databases, processing tens of thousands of account, transaction, and lifecycle events per day
Served as the primary technical point of contact for external partners, leading partner onboarding, production incident coordination, and post-incident root cause analysis
work.summary: Led complex third-party integrations for a regulated FinTech platform, owning solution design from architecture through production delivery. Acted as the technical point of contact for external partners and internal stakeholders, with responsibility for reliability, scalability, and regulatory alignment.

Owned critical services end-to-end, mentored engineers, and partnered with product and support teams to improve platform reliability, observability, and delivery velocity.

work.name: Emids (formerly Quovantis Technologies)
highlights: Developed backend APIs using .NET Web API and frontend features using Angular for an enterprise healthcare platform
Worked on Vatica Health, supporting management of health IDs and medical records in a regulated healthcare environment
Collaborated within a distributed, cross-functional Agile team to deliver production features iteratively
Gained early exposure to enterprise software standards, healthcare data workflows, and production-grade systems
work.summary: Contributed to a large-scale enterprise healthcare platform used across U.S. hospitals, working within an Agile delivery model and collaborating across engineering, product, and QA teams.

work.name: AtDrive Group
highlights: Built applications using .NET Framework, WPF, WCF, and Entity Framework across multiple internal and customer-facing products
Contributed to in-house platforms including inventory management, version control, profiling, and internal tooling
Helped evolve an internal product into a B2B offering (Fromine) for HR and employee services
Gained early hands-on experience with AWS and production-grade deployment practices
work.summary: Built a strong foundation in backend and desktop application development, contributing to multiple in-house and B2B products while gaining early exposure to AWS and production software practices.
